video.title: Vanilla Ice Goes Amish
video.synopsis: Rock star-home improvement expert Vanilla Ice travels deep into the largest Amish settlement in America to learn the lost art of handcraftsmanship.

episodes.synopsis: Settling into his new life on an Amish farm with his host John, Vanilla joins an Amish construction crew on a project to renovate an outdated kitchen.
episodes.title: Stranger in a Strange Land

episodes.synopsis: On a backyard patio project, Vanilla learns about the Amish work ethic from his new crew and in return, he teaches them a few Florida design tricks.
episodes.title: Palm Beach Patio Hits Ohio

episodes.synopsis: John and Vanilla transform a Mennonite family's basement into a modern family room, using Amish craftsmanship and Vanilla's entertainment expertise.
episodes.title: Old Basement Goes Feng Shui

episodes.synopsis: Proposed changes to Mel's hilltop house include new windows, a bigger patio and low-maintenance landscaping, and Vanilla arrives at the site in style.
episodes.title: Hillside Farm Gets A Facelift

episodes.synopsis: As a thank-you gift to the Amish community, Vanilla brings in his Florida team to work with Robert's Amish team on a barn-building project.
episodes.title: A Real Amish Barn Raising
